{{cpp/numeric/random/philox_engine/title|set_counter}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/philox_engine/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++26|
void set_counter( const std::array&lt;result_type, n&gt;&amp; c );
}}

Sets the {{rlp|/#Generator properties|counter}} of the random-number engine.
* For each integer {{c|k}} in {{range|0|n}}, sets {{mathjax-or|\(\scriptsize X_k \)|X{{su|b=k}}}} to {{mathjax-or|\(\scriptsize c_{n-1-k} \mod 2^w \)|c{{su|b=n-1-k}} mod 2{{su|p=w}}}}.
* The value of {{c|j}} is set to {{c|n - 1}}.&lt;ref&gt;As {{c|j}} is being set to {{c|n - 1}}, the next state transition always generates new random values.&lt;/ref&gt;

&lt;references/&gt;

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|c|counter sequence to use to set the counter}}
{{par end}}

===Complexity===
{{mathjax-or|\(\scriptsize O(n) \)|O(n)}}.
